NK125(co)001:1: // ston pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mdzad pa rmad du
NK125(co)001:2: byung ba bcu gnyis kyi tshul dad pa'i 'od stong
NK125(co)001:4: ston pa bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK125(co)001:5: gang tshe bskal mang bsod nams ye shes kyi //
NK125(co)001:6: dge tshogs chu gter bsrubs pa las thon pa'i //
NK125(co)001:7: mtshan dpe'i dkyil 'khor 'od stong cher 'dzum pas //
NK125(co)001:8: dge legs pad+mo'i gnyen gyur sh+aakya'i rgyal //
NK125(co)001:9: mtshan mchog bdud rtsi'i thigs pa lan gcig gis //
NK125(co)001:10: lus can srid zhi'i gdungs ba mthar 'byin nas //
NK125(co)001:11: mi gnas chos sku'i srog zungs sbyin mdzad pa'i //
NK125(co)001:12: mtshungs med stobs bcu'i dbang phyug thub dbang rje'i //
NK125(co)001:13: ngo mtshar slob pa'i skyes rabs rgya che zhing //
NK125(co)001:14: mi bslob dngos kyi mdzad pa mtha' yas kyang //
NK125(co)001:15: re zhig mdzad pa'i rnam grangs bcu gnyis tsam //
NK125(co)001:16: dang po'i las can blo la 'dzin bder bri //
NK125(co)001:17: de yang 'di ltar nges par bya ste /
NK125(co)001:18: dam chos pad+ma dkar po las /
NK125(co)001:19: bskal pa bye stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
NK125(co)001:20: de yi tshad ni nam yang med pa nas //
NK125(co)001:21: byang chub mchog rab de ni ngas rnyed cing //
NK125(co)001:22: nga ni rtag tu chos kyang rab tu ston //
NK125(co)001:24: bdag cag gi ston pa thugs rje can 'di nyid /
NK125(co)001:25: bskal pa bye ba phrag khrig bsam gyis mi khyab
NK125(co)001:26: pa'i snga rol nas dag pa gnyis ldan du mngon
NK125(co)001:27: par rdzogs par byang chub zin kyang /
NK125(co)001:28: de tsam gyis brtson pa'i mi 'dor bar slar yang
NK125(co)001:29: bzo dang skye ba mchog gi sprul pa sogs srid
NK125(co)001:30: pa ji srid kyi bar du 'gog med lhun grub
NK125(co)001:31: tu 'byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
NK125(co)001:32: ma 'dres pa'i khyad chos yin pa'i phyir /
NK125(co)001:33: re zhig mi mjed kyi zhing 'di'i gdul bya rnams
NK125(co)001:34: kyi bsod nams rnam par smin pa'i spyi mthun du
NK125(co)001:35: / mas sbyangs mchog gi sprul sku'i tshul du snang ba ni 'di ltar te /
NK125(co)001:36: dang po byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed /
NK125(co)001:37: bar du bskal chen grangs med gsum du tshogs bsags /
NK125(co)001:38: mthar mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi sgo nas mngon par
NK125(co)001:39: byang chub nas chos kyi bdud rtsis 'gro ba rnams
NK125(co)001:40: byang chub gsum la 'god par mdzad pa dang gsum
NK125(co)001:42: mdo sde bskal pa bzang po las /
NK125(co)001:43: nga ni sngon tshe dbul por gyur pa'i tshe //
NK125(co)001:44: de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa la //
NK125(co)001:45: 'byams gang zhig ni phul bar byas nas ni //
NK125(co)001:46: dang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do //
NK125(co)001:48: bdag cag gi ston pa 'di nyid sngon rdza mkhan gyi khye'u snang byed du gyur pa'i tshe /
NK125(co)001:49: de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa chen po la rdza yi bum pa byi dor byas pa dang /
NK125(co)001:50: 'gron bu lnga me tog gi tshul du phul nas /
NK125(co)001:51: de bzhin gshegs pa khyed sku ci 'dra dang //
NK125(co)001:54: grangs med dang po la bdag cag gi ston pa 'di nyid /
NK125(co)001:55: rgyal bu brtson 'grus spyod du gyur te /
NK125(co)001:56: bde gshegs phung po chen po nas 'dren pa gtsug
NK125(co)001:57: tor can la thug gi bar sangs rgyas bdun khri
NK125(co)001:58: lnga stong la bsnyen bkur byas te /
NK125(co)001:59: tshogs gnyis rgya chen po bsags /
NK125(co)001:60: grangs med gnyis pa la rgyal po mdzes par snang gi pho brang 'dzam bu'i gser zhes bya bar /
NK125(co)001:61: tshong dpon shes rab bzang por gyur te /
NK125(co)001:62: bde gshegs dkon mchog yan lag sogs nas /
NK125(co)001:63: 'dren pa mar me mdzad la thug gi bar sangs
NK125(co)001:64: rgyas bdun khri drug stong la bsnyen bkur mdzad nas
NK125(co)001:66: grong khyer pad+ma can du bdag gi ston pa 'di
NK125(co)001:67: nyid gzhon nu chos kyi sprin zhes bya bar gyur
NK125(co)001:68: te / 'dren pa mar me mdzad nas /
NK125(co)001:69: sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la thug gi bar sangs
NK125(co)001:70: rgyas bdun khri bdun stong la bsnyen bkur mdzad nas
NK125(co)001:71: 'di'i dus byang sems sa brgyad pa mar me mdzad
NK125(co)001:72: las lung bstan dang po thob par bshad /
NK125(co)001:74: tshogs gnyis rgya chen po rdzogs par mdzad do //
NK125(co)001:75: gsum pa mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul gyis mngon
NK125(co)001:76: par byang chub pa sogs kyi mdzad pa bsdus don
NK125(co)001:79: chos kyi sku las ma g.yos par /
NK125(co)001:80: sprul pa'i rang bzhin sna tshogs kyis //
NK125(co)001:81: skye ba mngon par skye ba dang //
NK125(co)001:82: dga' ldan gnas nas 'pho ba dang //
NK125(co)001:83: lhums su zhugs dang bltams pa dang //
NK125(co)001:84: bzo yi gnas la mkhas pa dang //
NK125(co)001:85: btsun mo'i 'khor dgyes rol pa dang //
NK125(co)001:86: nges 'byung dka' ba spyad pa dang //
NK125(co)001:87: byang chub snying por gshegs pa dang //
NK125(co)001:88: bdud sde bcom dang rdzogs par ni //
NK125(co)001:89: byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo dang //
NK125(co)001:90: mya ngan 'da' bar gshegs mdzad rnams //
NK125(co)001:91: yongs su ma dag zhing rnams su //
NK125(co)001:92: srid pa ji srid gnas par ston //
NK125(co)001:94: 1 gang gi tshe mi rnams tshe lo nyi khri'i
NK125(co)001:95: dus rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'jig rten du
NK125(co)001:96: byon pa na bdag cag gi ston pa 'di nyid
NK125(co)001:97: bram ze'i khye'u bla mar gyur pa la skye ba
NK125(co)001:98: gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di mi
NK125(co)001:99: rnams tshe lo brgya thub pa'i tshe rdzogs pa'i sangs
NK125(co)001:100: rgyas su 'gyur ba'i lung bstan phyi ma thob pa
NK125(co)001:101: ltar / de'i phyi ma la dga' ldan gyi gnas
NK125(co)001:102: su lha'i bu dam pa tog dkar po'i skye ba
NK125(co)001:103: bzung nas lha rnams smin par mdzad /
NK125(co)001:104: de nas mi rnams tshe lo brgya thub pa na /
NK125(co)001:105: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bskul ba'i phyir /
NK125(co)001:106: dga' ldan du lha'i rol mo sgra las /
NK125(co)001:107: bsod nams rgya mtsho'i tshogs mnga' dran stobs dang //
NK125(co)001:108: blo gros mtha' yas shes rab 'od mdzad pa //
NK125(co)001:109: mtshungs med rtogs mnga' sgyu rtsal rgya che ba //
NK125(co)001:110: mar me mdzad kyi lung bstan dgongs par mdzod //
NK125(co)001:111: ces grags pa las byang chub sems dpas mi rnams
NK125(co)001:112: 'dul ba'i dus la babs par mkhyen pa na lha'i
NK125(co)001:113: bu rnams kyis bshol 'debs pa'i phyir smras pa /
NK125(co)001:116: kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang /
NK125(co)001:117: mi pham skra yi lwa ba can sogs kyis dkrugs pas don mi 'grub par zhus pa la /
NK125(co)001:118: wa yi tshogs rnams kyis ri dwags kyi dbang po
NK125(co)001:119: zil gyis gnon pa ni gnas ma yin pa sogs
NK125(co)001:120: kyi tshul gsungs shing bskal mang nas goms pa'i thugs
NK125(co)001:121: kyi go cha lhag par dgongs par mdzad /
NK125(co)001:122: de nas 'dzam bu'i gling du mi rnams 'dul ba'i dus la babs par mkhyen nas /
NK125(co)001:123: nyid kyi rin po che'i cod pan byams pa la gnang nas rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur zhing /
NK125(co)001:124: kho bo ni mi rnams gdul ba'i phyir 'gro ste /
NK125(co)001:125: khyod rnams la ma pham pas chos ston par 'gyur gyi bag yod par gyis la /
NK125(co)001:126: 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba
NK125(co)001:127: na'ang nyan du shog cig ces gsungs nas rim gyis
NK125(co)001:128: byon pa dga' ldan nas 'pho ba'i mdzad pa dang
NK125(co)001:129: / 2 de nas sprul pa'i lus ji ltar ston pa lha'i bu rnams la dris pas /
NK125(co)001:130: la las ni tshangs pa'i tshul dang /
NK125(co)001:131: la las brgya byin gyi tshul du rigs so zhes
NK125(co)001:132: smras par de dag ni phyogs su lhung bar gzigs
NK125(co)001:133: nas / bram lha'i bu gzi brjid dam pa na re /
NK125(co)001:135: ze rnams kyi rigs byed kyi gzhung la grags pa ni /
NK125(co)001:136: glang chen dam pa lus chen mchog gyur pa //
NK125(co)001:137: mche ba drug ldan gser gyi d+r+wa bas g.yogs //
NK125(co)001:138: mgo bo rab tu dmar zhing shin tu mdzes //
NK125(co)001:139: 'gram bzang zag cing gzugs bzang ldan pa'o //
NK125(co)001:141: glang po che thal dkar mche ba drug ldan gser gyi d+r+wa bas g.yogs pa zhig tu sprul te /
NK125(co)001:142: gzigs pa rnam pa lnga'am bzhi'i tshul gyis /
NK125(co)001:143: yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma gso sbyongs la gnas
NK125(co)001:144: pa'i dus dge ba'i ltas bsam gyis mi khyab pa
NK125(co)001:146: lhums de yang rin po che'i bkod pa zhes bya
NK125(co)001:147: ba'i gzhal med khang chen por byin gyis brlabs nas
NK125(co)001:148: zla ba bcu yi bar bde bar bzhugs pa lhums
NK125(co)001:149: su zhugs pa'i mdzad pa dang /
NK125(co)001:150: 3 de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi
NK125(co)001:151: skyed mos tshal rnams su me tog sna tshogs kha
NK125(co)001:152: 'bus pa dang / gter chen po nyi khri yang kha bye ba dang /
NK125(co)001:153: mdzod kyi rin po che rnams las kyang rin po che'i myu gu 'phel ba dang /
NK125(co)001:154: gzhan yang sa g.yo ba dang /
NK125(co)001:155: 'od zer gyi snang ba chen pos khyab pa sogs
NK125(co)001:156: ngo mtshar ba'i ltas bzang po bsam gyis mi khyab
NK125(co)001:157: pa byung zhing / btsa' ba'i dus la babs pa
NK125(co)001:158: na lha mo sgyu 'phrul shing lum+ba'i tshal legs par
NK125(co)001:159: brgyan pa'i nang du gshegs pa la /
NK125(co)001:160: shing ljon pa chen pos phyag byas pa'i yal ga nas bzung ba'i mod la /
NK125(co)001:161: byang chub sems dpa'i sku nor bu ltar dwangs shing
NK125(co)001:162: mtshan dang dpe byad kyis mdzes pa rgyan dang na
NK125(co)001:163: bza' bcas yum la gnod pa med par glo g.yas
NK125(co)001:164: nas 'khrungs la / tshangs pa dang brgya byin la
NK125(co)001:165: sogs pa'i lha'i tshogs dpag tu med pas mchod cing
NK125(co)001:166: nas 'khrungs la / / phyogs drug tu gom pa
NK125(co)001:167: bdun bdun bor ba las pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang
NK125(co)001:168: ldan pa shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam re re yang
NK125(co)001:169: nas 'khrungs la / / byung zhing / nga ni
NK125(co)001:170: 'jig rten na mchog go zhes pa la sogs pas
NK125(co)001:171: seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa yang mdzad /
NK125(co)001:172: de'i tshe kun dga' bo la sogs sh+aakya gzhon nu lnga brgya btsas /
NK125(co)001:173: basngagasa ldan la sogs rta mchog lnga brgya btsas /
NK125(co)001:174: khams kyi rgyal phran bzhi la bum bzhi yang btsas te /
NK125(co)001:175: ma ga d+har rgyal po pad+ma chen po'i bu gzugs can snying po /
NK125(co)001:176: ko sa lar rgyal po tshangs byin gyi bu gsal rgyal /
NK125(co)001:177: grong khyer rdo mchog tu rgyal po mu khyud mtha' yas kyi bu rab snang dang /
NK125(co)001:178: koo sham+b+hi'i bad sa lar rgyal po dmag brgya pa'i bu shar ba ste /
NK125(co)001:179: 'od zer gyi snang ba byung ba dag rang rang
NK125(co)001:180: gi bu yi ltas su 'dod nas ming yang de
NK125(co)001:182: de nas bram ze mtshan stas mkhan phal gyis brtags pas /
NK125(co)001:183: gzhon nu 'di ni 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur te
NK125(co)001:184: khyim na gnas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por
NK125(co)001:185: 'gyur gyi / khyim nas khyim med par rab tu
NK125(co)001:186: 'byung na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes
NK125(co)001:187: 'gyur gyi / lung bstan / de'i tshe mi'i drang srong nyon mongs med dang /
NK125(co)001:188: snag gi drang srong mes byin gnyis rang rang gi
NK125(co)001:189: rdzu 'phrul gyis der phyin nas rgyal po chen po
NK125(co)001:190: mtshan ltas mkhan rnams kyis gzhon nu 'di ji ltar
NK125(co)001:191: lung bstan zhes dris pa la /
NK125(co)001:192: rgyal pos de'i lo rgyus bsnyad pa la /
NK125(co)001:193: drang srong nyon mongs med kyis smras pa /
NK125(co)001:194: sa bdag rtog pa po rnams blo 'khrul te //
NK125(co)001:195: rtsod pa 'i dus su 'khor los sgyur mi 'byung //
NK125(co)001:196: bsod nams mchog gi chos kyi mdzod 'di ni //
NK125(co)001:197: nyes las rnam par rgyal nas sangs rgyas 'gyur //
NK125(co)001:198: zhes lung bstan nas mig gnas mchi ma phyung ngo //
NK125(co)001:199: der rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzhon nu 'di la
NK125(co)001:200: gnod pa'i bag gzhan zhig mchis sam snyam pas rtab
NK125(co)001:203: gzhon nu 'di la rdo rje'i ser ba bab kyang nyam nga bar mi 'gyur la /
NK125(co)001:204: 'on kyang bdag ni rgas shing 'khog pas /
NK125(co)001:205: gzhon nu 'di mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i bdud rtsi'i
NK125(co)001:206: bgo bsha' thob par mi 'gyur bas bdag gi sems
NK125(co)001:207: rab tu gdungs bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes smras
NK125(co)001:210: rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'khor bcas kyi bzhes pa'i
NK125(co)001:211: don thams cad yongs su grub pas na gzhon nu
NK125(co)001:212: don thams cad grub pa zhes mtshan du gdags te
NK125(co)001:213: / skye dgu'i bdag po la sogs ma ma so
NK125(co)001:214: gnyis la gtad de mtsho chen po la gnas pa'i
NK125(co)001:215: pad+ma ltar cher bskyed pa sogs ni sku bltams pa'i
NK125(co)001:218: 4 / de nas yid shing nor bu rin po ches spras
NK125(co)001:219: pa gser gyi yang mig can thogs te byis pa
NK125(co)001:220: kun gyi bshes gnyen srin bu go cha zhes bya
NK125(co)001:221: ba'i yi ge'i grwar byon nas /
NK125(co)001:222: +aa li dang k+aa li rnams slob pa'i tshul bstan cing /
NK125(co)001:223: slob dpon gyis ming tsam mi shes pa'i yig rigs
NK125(co)001:224: mtha' yas pa mngon sum slar bstan par mdzad pas
NK125(co)001:225: byis pa sum khri nyis stong yang smin par mdzad
NK125(co)001:226: la / rtsis pa sh+aakya srid sgrub kyi drung du byon nas /
NK125(co)001:229: 'phong dang gyod kyi 'dzin stangs la sogs pa 'jig
NK125(co)001:230: rten pa'i bslab pa'i gnas rnams la'ang slob par mdzad
NK125(co)001:231: cing / slob dpon las lhag pa'i mchog brnyes pas
NK125(co)001:232: skye dgu rnams shin tu ngo mtshar bar mdzad pa
NK125(co)001:233: rnams ni bzo yi gnas la mkhas pa'i mdzad pa
NK125(co)001:234: cing / dang / 5 de nas dgung lo bco brgyad lon pa na /
NK125(co)001:235: rgyal po'i gdung rgyun mi bcad pa'i don du yon
NK125(co)001:236: tan khyad par can dang ldan pa'i btsun mo dam
NK125(co)001:237: pa rnams bzhes par gsol ba na /
NK125(co)001:238: byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs med pa'i
NK125(co)001:239: snga rol nas chags bral gyi 'phags par gyur kyang
NK125(co)001:240: / kun tu rgyu la sogs pas log par smra
NK125(co)001:241: ba sel ba'i phyir mchog gi sprul sku rnams kyi
NK125(co)001:242: mdzad pa yin pas na zhal gyis bzhes par mdzad
NK125(co)001:243: / / de nas yab kyis sh+aakya lag na be con sogs gsum la /
NK125(co)001:244: bu mo rgyal po'i btsun mor bslangs pa la /
NK125(co)001:246: gang sh+aakya rnams kyi lugs su 'phongs dang sgyu rtsal
NK125(co)001:247: phun sum tshogs pa yod pa de la sbyin gyi
NK125(co)001:249: rgyal po thugs ma rangs nas gzhon nu la smras so /
NK125(co)001:250: 'jig rten gsum na nga las ches mchog tu gyur
NK125(co)001:251: pa'i 'phong dang sgyu rtsal mnga' ba gzhan med pas
NK125(co)001:252: / ser skya'i gnas na bdag la 'gran par nus
NK125(co)001:253: pa yod na grong khyer gyi phyi rol du dengs
NK125(co)001:255: lhas byin khros nas glang chen la thal mos bsnun pas shi /
NK125(co)001:256: kun dga' bos sgo khang nas phyir bor /
NK125(co)001:257: byang chub sems dpas shing rta las ma bab par
NK125(co)001:258: zhabs kyi mthe ngos bzung ste grong khyer gyi phyi
NK125(co)001:259: rol ra ba bdun 'das par 'phags pas glang po'i
NK125(co)001:260: gshongs zhes bya ba'i 'obs chen po yod do //
NK125(co)001:262: glang po'i dbang po rdo ba bzhin du bzhud //
NK125(co)001:263: zhabs kyi mthe bos glang po'i dbang po blangs //
NK125(co)001:264: ra ba bdun dang 'ob bdun yongs 'das te //
NK125(co)001:265: grong khyer 'di yi phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs //
NK125(co)001:266: mkhyen pa mchog mnga' 'di ni gdon mi za //
NK125(co)001:268: de nas sh+aakya gzhon nu dregs pa can rnams dang /
NK125(co)001:269: skye bo'i tshogs du ma dang bcas grong khyer gyi
NK125(co)001:270: phyi rol du dengs te sgyu rtsal 'gran pa la
NK125(co)001:271: zhugs pas 'phong gi 'dzin stangs sogs las shing rta
NK125(co)001:272: la bdun dang / lcags kyi phag gu bdun /
NK125(co)001:273: lcags kyi sla nga bdun bcas 'dzugs par mda' 'phong bar brtsam pa na /
NK125(co)001:274: byang chub sems dpas gzhu rnams 'geng rin ma bzod par rgyud thams cad chad /
NK125(co)001:275: mas seng ge 'gram gyi gnam ru langs la byin cig gsungs nas /
NK125(co)001:277: der sh+aakya gzhon nu rnams la gzhu 'di ji lta
NK125(co)001:278: ba bzhin rdungs shig gsungs pas sus kyang brdung bar
NK125(co)001:280: brdung ba dang 'geng bar mdzad de /
NK125(co)001:283: sla nga bdun rnams thal mar phyungs te /
NK125(co)001:284: sa la zug pa dbyung ba'i shul nas chu 'bab
NK125(co)001:285: pa mda' chu khron pa zhes bya ba deng song
NK125(co)001:288: kun dga' bos bzhi las 'bigs ma nus par gyur /
NK125(co)001:291: bang dang mchongs la sogs sgyu rtsal thams cad 'gran pas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu gyur te /
NK125(co)001:292: tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan pa sh+aakya gzhon nu
NK125(co)001:293: dregs pa can thams cad zil gyis gnon cing spa
NK125(co)001:295: de nas sh+aakya lag na be con gyi bu mo sa mtsho ma dang /
NK125(co)001:296: lag na dril bu'i sgra yi bu mo grags 'dzin ma dang /
NK125(co)001:297: zas dkar gyi bu mo ri dwags skyes 'khor nyi
NK125(co)001:298: khri ste drug khri khab tu bzhes pa'i tshul bstan
NK125(co)001:299: pa btsun mo'i 'khor dang dgyes par rol ba'i tshul
NK125(co)001:300: dang / thams cad kyis gzhon nu don thams cad
NK125(co)001:301: grub pa 'di nam zhig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
NK125(co)001:302: por 'gyur zhes yid smon du bzung ste phyogs kyi
NK125(co)001:303: rgyal phran rnams kyis kyang gya nom pa'i skyes bzang
NK125(co)001:305: re zhig gi dus slas kyi 'khor rnams gnyid mthug gis non pa gzigs pas dur khrod dang /
NK125(co)001:306: mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes kyis thugs dbyung ba'i tshul dang /
NK125(co)001:307: nam byang chub sems dpa' dus las mi 'da' yang /
NK125(co)001:308: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bskul ba chos nyid yin pa'i phyir /
NK125(co)001:309: de dag gi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rol mo'i sgra las /
NK125(co)001:310: bum par chud pa'i bung ba 'khor ba bzhin //
NK125(co)001:311: srid gsum mi rtag ston ka'i sprin dang 'dra //
NK125(co)001:312: 'gro ba'i skye 'chi gar la blta dang mtshungs //
NK125(co)001:313: 'gro ba'i tshe srog nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste //
NK125(co)001:314: ri zer 'bab chu bzhin du mgyogs par 'gro //
NK125(co)001:315: 'chi med mya ngan med par sangs rgyas te //
NK125(co)001:316: skoms pas nyam thag bdud rtsis tshim byas shing //
NK125(co)001:317: khyod kyi sngon smras tshig mchog sdug bsngal brgyas gang sems can mthong nas ni //
NK125(co)001:318: 'gro ba'i mgon dang skyabs dang gnas gyur cing //
NK125(co)001:319: phan byed mgon dang dpung gnyen gyur cig ces //
NK125(co)001:320: khyod kyis sngon gyi smon lam de skad btab //
NK125(co)001:321: dge bas dpa' bo sngon gyi spyod pa dang //
NK125(co)001:322: 'gro phan bya zhes smon btab dran par byos //
NK125(co)001:325: grong khyer dam pa 'di nas myur du phyung //
NK125(co)001:328: rgyal srid la dga' ba med par gyur /
NK125(co)001:329: yab kyis bskyed mos tshal du 'dod yon la rtser
NK125(co)001:330: btang ba'i shing rta'i kha lo ba grogs 'dun pas
NK125(co)001:331: bsgyur te gshegs pa'i tshe grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi
NK125(co)001:332: so so nas rga na 'chi dang /
NK125(co)001:333: dge sbyong gi yon tan bcas gzigs pa'i rkyen las /
NK125(co)001:334: yab la rab tu byung bar zhus pa ma gnang bar khang bzang zab mor bzhugs su gsol te /
NK125(co)001:335: phyogs bzhi nas sh+aakya lnga brgya brgyas bsrungs shing gnas pa las /
NK125(co)001:336: zhag bdun 'das pa'i nam gyi gung la lha rnams
NK125(co)001:337: kyi mthus mi'i tshogs thams cad gnyid mthug pos non
NK125(co)001:339: rta'i rgyal po basngagasa ldan chibs pa'i yan lag bzhi /
NK125(co)001:342: lo ma dang lo gyon bzhis btegs te /
NK125(co)001:343: lha'i tshogs dpag tu med pas mchod bzhin bar snang
NK125(co)001:344: las gshegs te mchod rten rnam dag gi drung du
NK125(co)001:346: grogs 'dun pa bcas phyir la bzlog go //
NK125(co)001:347: de'i tshe ral gri ut+pala lta bus nyid kyi dbu skra nyid kyis bsil ba dang /
NK125(co)001:348: lha rnams kyis sprul pa'i rngon pas na bza' ngur smrig phul ba yang blangs /
NK125(co)001:349: gzhan du sa'i lha mo brtan mas na bza' ngur
NK125(co)001:350: smrig phul zhes 'byung ba lugs gzhan 'gal ba med
NK125(co)001:351: do // sa byi dpyid zla chung gi tshes brgyad
NK125(co)001:352: la dpal rang byung gi bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad
NK125(co)001:353: do // pa rnams ni / rgyal po'i khab nas nges par 'byung ba'i mdzad pa dang /
NK125(co)001:356: dman pa la mchog tu 'dzin pa'i lta ba dang /
NK125(co)001:357: gcer bu rtse gsum la mchongs pa /
NK125(co)001:358: me lnga bsten pa la sogs pa'i dka' spyad tsam
NK125(co)001:359: gyis grol bar rlom pa'i mu stegs pa'i lam dang
NK125(co)001:360: / thar pa ma yin pa la thar par 'khrul
NK125(co)001:361: pa'i lam gyis 'khor ba las 'da' mi nus par
NK125(co)001:362: / ston pa'i phyir / 'jig rten pa'i lam ston pa la mkhas par grags pa /
NK125(co)001:363: rang byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang /
NK125(co)001:364: sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gnyis las /
NK125(co)001:365: 'jig rten pa'i lam srid rtse'i bar gyi bsam gtan bslab ste /
NK125(co)001:366: chu bo ni rany+dza na'i 'gram du lnga sde bzang po dang nye ba'i bas mthar /
NK125(co)001:367: dbugs 'byung rngubs bkag ste mi g.yo ba la sogs
NK125(co)001:368: pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas til
NK125(co)001:369: phyed phyed tsam gsol ba'i dka' ba lo drug spyad
NK125(co)001:370: pas sku shin tu rid cing skems par gyur pa
NK125(co)001:372: mi yi dbang po sh+aakya'i sras po 'di //
NK125(co)001:373: gnag pa sems can don yang mnga' mdzad cing //
NK125(co)001:374: 'jig rten gsum po sdug bsngal mgon med par //
NK125(co)001:375: mdzad nas mgon 'di 'gro ba gang 'gyur ram //
NK125(co)001:377: sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje'i 'od zer gyis bskul te /
NK125(co)001:378: dka' thub las bzhengs pa dang /
NK125(co)001:379: de'i tshe grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas ba
NK125(co)001:380: lnga brgya'i 'o ma bzhos pa'i nying khu'i 'o thug
NK125(co)001:381: phul te / gsol ba phul ba'i bsod nams ci mchis pa //
NK125(co)001:382: grags dang ldan pa'i don kun 'grub gyur nas //
NK125(co)001:383: mi yi dbang po blo mchog ldan pa de'i //
NK125(co)001:384: don rnams thams cad myur du 'grub gyur cig /
NK125(co)001:385: ces smon lam bcas gsol bas /
NK125(co)001:386: sku gser btso ma'i gtan pa phyis pa ltar gyur pa rnams ni /
NK125(co)001:387: dka' ba spyad pa'i mdzad pa dang /
NK125(co)001:388: 8 de nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mang pos
NK125(co)001:389: kyang byang chub brnyes pa'i gnas rdo rje'i gdan la
NK125(co)001:390: thugs gtad de gshegs pa'i lam du /
NK125(co)001:391: rtsa 'tshang bkra shis kyis rtsa ku sha rma bya'i
NK125(co)001:392: mgrin pa ltar sngo zhing 'jam la dri zhim pa
NK125(co)001:394: byang chub kyi shing drung du ma 'khrugs par bting
NK125(co)001:395: ba la skyiil mo krung gis bzhugs shing sku drang
NK125(co)001:396: por bsrang ba'i zhal shar phyogs su gzigs nas /
NK125(co)001:397: stan 'dir bdag gi lus 'di skems kyang rung //
NK125(co)001:398: pags pa rus pa'i tshogs ni zhig kyang rung //
NK125(co)001:399: bskal mang rnyed daka'i byang chub ma thob par //
NK125(co)001:400: stan 'di las ni lus bskyod mi bya'o //
NK125(co)001:401: zhes dam bcas pa la rgyal ba sras dang bcas
NK125(co)001:402: pa rnams kyis yang dag par bstod pa rnams ni
NK125(co)001:403: byang chub snying por gshegs pa'i mdzad pa dang /
NK125(co)001:405: 9 / skabs 'dir byang chub sems dpa' dgung lo so lnga
NK125(co)001:406: la babs par shing rta sa ga zla ba'i tshes
NK125(co)001:407: bco lnga'i srod kyi dus smin mtshams nas bdud kyi
NK125(co)001:408: dkyil 'khor rnam par 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i 'od
NK125(co)001:409: zer mtha' yas pa bkye zhing /
NK125(co)001:410: 'od kyi rtse mo nas bdud zil gyis gnon pa'i sgra chen po byung bas /
NK125(co)001:411: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
NK125(co)001:412: snang ba chen po dang bcas pas khyab par mdzad
NK125(co)001:413: pas / bdud dngas shing skrag ste /
NK125(co)001:414: 'di ci yi ltas snyam pa na /
NK125(co)001:415: byang chub sems dpa' mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i ltas su rig nas /
NK125(co)001:416: de ma thag phyin pa'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa /
NK125(co)001:417: khyod rgyal po'i khye'u gcig pu la /
NK125(co)001:418: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la ci dgar mi
NK125(co)001:419: spyod par 'dir ci'i phyir du gcig pur 'chi zhes
NK125(co)001:420: smras so // byang chub sems dpas /
NK125(co)001:421: bdag bskal mang nas don du gnyer ba'i byang chub bla na med pa kho na'i phyir zhes gsungs /
NK125(co)001:423: de ni de 'dras thob mi nus te khyod la
NK125(co)001:424: de'i rgyu bsgrubs pa ma mchis pa'i phyir ro zhes
NK125(co)001:425: smras so // sdig can khyod kyis gtan pa med
NK125(co)001:426: pa'i sbyin pa lan gcig gis 'dod pa khams kyi
NK125(co)001:428: ngas bskal pa grangs med pa nas tshogs rgya chen
NK125(co)001:429: po mthar phyin par mdzad pas ci'i phyir byang chub
NK125(co)001:430: mi thob gsungs / 'o na nga'i gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin gyi dpang po khyod lags na /
NK125(co)001:431: khyod kyis de ltar bgyis pa'i dpang po de su zhig mchis zhes smras so //
NK125(co)001:432: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i phyag bsod nams brgya las grub pa sa la bsnun te /
NK125(co)001:433: ngas ni 'di na mchod sbyin gtan pa med //
NK125(co)001:434: byas pa la ni khyod nyid dpang yin na //
NK125(co)001:435: khyod la 'di na dpang 'ga' yod min pas //
NK125(co)001:436: smras kyang dpang med khyod ni ye pham yin //
NK125(co)001:438: sa 'di 'gro ba kun gyi gnas yin te //
NK125(co)001:439: rgyu dang mi rgyu snyoms zhing nye mkhon med //
NK125(co)001:440: 'di ni bdag gi dpang ste bdag rdzun med //
NK125(co)001:441: 'di la khyod kyis bdag gi dpang byos shig /
NK125(co)001:443: de'i tshe lha mo brtan ma gser gyi kha dog can lus phyed sa las thon te smras pa /
NK125(co)001:444: skyes bu chen po de de bzhin no //
NK125(co)001:445: khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin te /
NK125(co)001:446: 'di ni bdag la mngon sum mo zhes mi snang bar gyur /
NK125(co)001:447: der bdud skyengs te smra ba'i spobs pa gtugs bzhin slar log ste /
NK125(co)001:448: dpung gi tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'jigs su rung
NK125(co)001:449: ba'i rnam 'gyur du ma dang bcas steng gi bar
NK125(co)001:451: ri dang brag dang me dang thog dang 'khor lo dang /
NK125(co)001:452: mdung thung ral gri gtun shing dang /
NK125(co)001:453: mda' bo che la sogs pa'i mtshon cha'i tshogs dpag
NK125(co)001:454: tu med pa skyin thang drag po'i rgyun bzhin bar
NK125(co)001:456: byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus gnod pa med
NK125(co)001:457: par me tog gi char 'ba' zhig tu gyur nas
NK125(co)001:458: la la ni bla re bres pa'i tshul du gnas
NK125(co)001:459: so // de ltar zhe sdang gi rnam 'gyur gyis bardzi bar ma nus la /
NK125(co)001:460: de nas bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis 'dod pa'i
NK125(co)001:461: sgyu thabs sna tshogs kyi rnam 'gyur ngoms kyang bslu
NK125(co)001:462: bar ma nus par rgas 'khogs mkhar ba la brten
NK125(co)001:463: pa kho nar byin gyis brlab par mdzad pa na
NK125(co)001:464: / bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis phyag byas shing rnam dag sku mnga' mchog tu gzugs bzang ba /
NK125(co)001:465: ye shes rgya mtsho gser gyi lhun po 'dra /
NK125(co)001:466: grags pa 'jig rten gsum na lham me ba /
NK125(co)001:467: mgon po mchog gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK125(co)001:469: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pas snga ma bzhin
NK125(co)001:470: du gyur te slar log pa rnams ni bdud kyi
NK125(co)001:471: sde rab tu bcom pa'i mdzad pa dang /
NK125(co)001:473: 10 / de nas nam gyi cha stod la de nyid du mnyam par bzhag pas /
NK125(co)001:474: rab matha'i bsam gtan la brten nas rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang /
NK125(co)001:475: lha'i rna ba'i mngon shes bsgrub par mdzad /
NK125(co)001:476: gung thun la gzhan sems shes pa dang /
NK125(co)001:479: thun tha ma skya rengs 'char khar zag pa zad pa'i mngon shes bsgrubs pas /
NK125(co)001:480: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin skad gcig dang
NK125(co)001:481: ldan pa'i ye shes kyis spang bya'i lhag ma ma
NK125(co)001:483: rtogs pa mthar thug pa yongs su rdzogs nas sku
NK125(co)001:484: dang ye shes kyi bdag nyid mngon par byang chub
NK125(co)001:485: pas / 'jig rten na sa g.yo ba dang /
NK125(co)001:486: 'od zer gyi snang bas khyab pa dang /
NK125(co)001:487: me tog gi char bab pa la sogs dang /
NK125(co)001:488: lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro bas mchod pa rnams ni byang chub pa'i mdzad pa dang /
NK125(co)001:489: 11 de nas zhag bdun phrag bdun du chos mi gsung bar thugs gzhol te /
NK125(co)001:490: bdun phrag dang por skyil dkrung ma bshig par bzhugs gnyis par 'dzam gling nye bar bcag /
NK125(co)001:491: gsum par stong gsum ring du bcang /
NK125(co)001:492: bzhi par byang chub kyi shing la gzigs /
NK125(co)001:493: lnga par klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas su gshegs /
NK125(co)001:494: drug pa kun tu rgyu rnams btul /
NK125(co)001:495: bdun par shing sgrol rgyu'i tshal du bzhugs /
NK125(co)001:496: de'i tshe 'jig rten na chos ston pa'i mdzad pa bsgyur ba'i tshul gyis /
NK125(co)001:497: zab zhi spros bral 'od gsal 'dus ma byas //
NK125(co)001:498: bdud rtsi lta bu'i chos zhig kho bos rnyed //
NK125(co)001:499: su la bstan kyang go bar mi 'gyur bas //
NK125(co)001:500: mi smra nags kyi gnas su gnas par bya //
NK125(co)001:501: zhes gsungs te bzhugs pa la /
NK125(co)001:503: bzang skyong gis sbrang rtsi phul ba /
NK125(co)001:504: rgyal po chen po bzhis rin po che beed+aur+ya'i lhung bzed phul ba ma bzhes /
NK125(co)001:505: rdo'i lhung bzed bzhi phul ba gcig tu byin gyis brlabs te bzhes nas /
NK125(co)001:506: lha yi bkra shis don grub cing //
NK125(co)001:507: phyogs rnams bkra shis byed pa des //
NK125(co)001:508: khyod kyi don rnams 'grub gyur cig /
NK125(co)001:509: thams cad myur du mthun par shog /
NK125(co)001:511: sbrang rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyal bar lung bstan to //
NK125(co)001:512: de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas /
NK125(co)001:513: gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa phul nas /
NK125(co)001:514: ye shes chen po mchog gi dkyil 'a khor bsgrubs nas ni //
NK125(co)001:515: phyogs bcu dag tu 'od zer rnam par bkye mdzad de //
NK125(co)001:516: ye shes zer gyis mi yi pad+mo kha 'byed pas //
NK125(co)001:517: smra ba'i nyi ma de ring ci slad btang snyoms bzhugs //
NK125(co)001:520: skye dgu 'dod pa rnams kyis bcings //
NK125(co)001:521: nyon mongs rgyun ni rab tu brtas //
NK125(co)001:522: nga yis tsheg ni chen pos rnyed //
NK125(co)001:523: de lta bas na bstan mi phan //
NK125(co)001:524: tshangs pa nga yi tha ba kun //
NK125(co)001:525: bcom nas tshegs chen gyis rtogs pa'i //
NK125(co)001:527: dkris pas bde blag rtogs ma yin //
NK125(co)001:530: ma ga d+ha yi yul 'dir sngon chad chos //
NK125(co)001:531: ma dag dri ma'i rjes su 'brel bar gyur //
NK125(co)001:532: dbye bar mdzod cig bdud rtsi'i sgo mo'i chos //
NK125(co)001:533: rdul bral dri ma med pa bshad du gsol //
NK125(co)001:537: zla ba nya ba gza' las thar ba ltar //
NK125(co)001:538: khyod kyi thugs ni rnam par grol ba lags //
NK125(co)001:539: g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba bzhengs su gsol //
NK125(co)001:540: 'jig rten mun par shes rab 'od phyung gsol //
NK125(co)001:542: gser gyi man+dala dpag tshad lnga bcu yod pa phul lo //
NK125(co)001:543: de nas zhal gyis bzhes pa'i phyir /
NK125(co)001:545: tshangs pa ma ga d+ha yi sems can gang //
NK125(co)001:546: rna bar ldan zhing dad dang shes rab ldan //
NK125(co)001:547: mi 'tshe 'du shes rtag tu chos nyan pa //
NK125(co)001:548: de dag la ni bdud rtsi'i sgo dabye'o //
NK125(co)001:549: zhes zhal gyis bzhes par mdzad do //
NK125(co)001:550: de la bdag gis thog mar su zhig la chos ston dgongs te /
NK125(co)001:551: rgyud drang zhing log ltas ma bslad pa drang srong nyon mongs med dang /
NK125(co)001:552: mas byin gnyis la bstan dgongs rtsa na /
NK125(co)001:553: de gnyis dus las 'das pa zhag bdun langs par gzigs /
NK125(co)001:555: lhag spyod dang ring 'phur gnyis la bstan dgongs kyang /
NK125(co)001:556: de gnyis dus las 'das nas zhag gcig lon par gzigs /
NK125(co)001:557: 'o na lnga sde bzang po la bstan dgongs pas /
NK125(co)001:558: lnga sde ni wa ra na sir bsam gtan la gnas shing /
NK125(co)001:559: dkar po rnam smin gyi sa bon kyang dus su smin par gzigs nas /
NK125(co)001:560: dal bus wa ra na sir gshegs /
NK125(co)001:561: kun tu rgyu nyer 'gro dang 'phrad pas dris pa /
NK125(co)001:562: go'u ta ma khyod su las rab byung /
NK125(co)001:564: nyer 'gro nga la mkhan po med /
NK125(co)001:565: nga dang 'dra ba yod ma yin //
NK125(co)001:566: nga ni gcig pur rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK125(co)001:567: bsil gyur zag pa zad pa yin //
NK125(co)001:569: yang khyod dgra bcom pa yin nam zhes smras /
NK125(co)001:571: nga nyid 'jig rten dgra bcom ste //
NK125(co)001:572: nga ni ston pa bla na med //
NK125(co)001:573: lha dang lha min dri zar bcas //
NK125(co)001:574: nga ni do zla'i gang zag med //
NK125(co)001:579: gang zag zag pa zad brnyes pa //
NK125(co)001:580: nga 'dra rgyal bar shes par gyis //
NK125(co)001:581: nga ni sdig pa'i chos las rgyal //
NK125(co)001:582: de bas nyes bcom rgyal ba yin //
NK125(co)001:586: nga ni wa ra na sir 'gro //
NK125(co)001:587: grong khyer gsal ldan der song nas //
NK125(co)001:588: long ba lta bu'i sems can la //
NK125(co)001:589: chos kyi sgron me sbar du 'gro //
NK125(co)001:590: 'on pa lta bu'i sems can la //
NK125(co)001:591: chos kyi rnga chen brdung du 'gro //
NK125(co)001:593: de nas rim gyis wa ra n+aa sir byon pas /
NK125(co)001:594: lnga sdes rgyang ring nas bcom ldan 'das byon pa mthong ba la /
NK125(co)001:595: dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di sngar ni neny+dza nar
NK125(co)001:596: bsam gtan bsgom pa la gnas pa'i dus rang cag
NK125(co)001:598: da ni 'di dka' thub las ni nyams /
NK125(co)001:599: mang du zos pas lus ni stobs su gyur /
NK125(co)001:600: lhod po 'di la rang res zhe sa dang ldong bar mi bya /
NK125(co)001:601: bag phebs smra bar mi bya bar nang khrims bcas te gnas pa na /
NK125(co)001:602: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams chen po'i gzi byin ma bzod par thams cad ldong ste /
NK125(co)001:603: dge sbyong go'u ta ma khyod 'ong ba legs so
NK125(co)001:604: zhes bag phebs su smras pas lnga sde'i khrims rang
NK125(co)001:605: zhig tu song / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
NK125(co)001:606: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
NK125(co)001:607: rgyas la nye ba'i tshig gis bsnyed par mi bya
NK125(co)001:610: 'o na khyod kyis bdud rtsi brnyes sam zhes smras pa la /
NK125(co)001:612: kho bos ni bdud rtsi mchog brnyes pas sku'i 'od dang gzi brjid la ltos /
NK125(co)001:613: de ltar na kho bo cag la bdud rtsi'i bgo bsha' ster bar mdzod cig /
NK125(co)001:614: ces zhus pa la zhal gyis bzhes par mdzad nas /
NK125(co)001:615: lo de'i chu stod zla ba'i tshes bzhir /
NK125(co)001:616: wa ra n+aa sa'i gnas der sangs rgyas stong gis
NK125(co)001:617: chos 'khor bskor ba'i khri rang byung du yod pa'i
NK125(co)001:618: bzhi pa'i steng du bzhugs te /
NK125(co)001:619: 'khor gyi dang po lnga ste bzang po la /
NK125(co)001:621: dung gi tshems bar nas bton /
NK125(co)001:622: 'phrul gyi ljags brkyangs pa las bkrol /
NK125(co)001:623: tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis rnam par phyes te /
NK125(co)001:624: bden pa bzhi'i chos kyi 'khor lo /
NK125(co)001:634: lam rgyud la brten par bya'o //
NK125(co)001:636: sdug bsngal shes zin slar shes par byar med kun
NK125(co)001:637: 'byung spangs zin slar spang bar byar med 'gog pa
NK125(co)001:638: mngon du byas zin slar mngon du byar med lam
NK125(co)001:639: rgyud brten zin slar rgyud la brten par byar med
NK125(co)001:640: do // bzlas pa rnam pa bcu gnyis su skor bas /
NK125(co)001:641: lnga sdes dgra bcom pa thob /
NK125(co)001:642: lha brgyad khris bden pa mthong /
NK125(co)001:643: de nas nye ba'i lnga sde sogs gdul bya'i 'gro
NK125(co)001:644: ba mtha' yas pa rnams lam dang 'bras bu la
NK125(co)001:645: 'god par mdzad / gnas rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po la sogs /
NK125(co)001:646: dri med 1grags pa 2gang po 3ba lang bdag 4lag bzang /
NK125(co)001:649: lha klu gnod sbyin mi'i 'gro ba theg pa chen
NK125(co)001:650: po'i rigs can tshad med pa la dka' bar pa
NK125(co)001:651: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston pa
NK125(co)001:652: dang / yang gnas gcig tu nges pa med pa /
NK125(co)001:655: 'od ma'i tshal la sogs par byon te /
NK125(co)001:656: rang bzhin sna tshogs pa'i gdul bya rnams la /
NK125(co)001:657: bka' tha ma nges pa don gyi rnam grangs ston
NK125(co)001:658: pa legs pa rnam par phye ba'i chos kyi 'khor
NK125(co)001:659: lo rnams rim par bskor bas theg pa che chung
NK125(co)001:660: gi rigs can mtha' yas pa rnams smin par mdzad
NK125(co)001:661: pa ste / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i mdzad pa dang /
NK125(co)001:662: 12 de nas re zhig 'os su gyur pa /
NK125(co)001:664: kun tu rgyu rab bzang gi bar gyi gdul bya rnams /
NK125(co)001:665: dngos kyis 'dul ba'i mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs nas /
NK125(co)001:666: le lo can skyo bas bskul ba dang /
NK125(co)001:667: 'dod sred can nges par 'byung ba dang /
NK125(co)001:668: rtag 'dzin can bag yod la sbyar ba'i phyir /
NK125(co)001:669: de bzhin gshegs pa dgung lo brgyad cur babs pa'i dus lcags 'brug sa ga zla ba'i nya la /
NK125(co)001:670: gyad kyi yul grong khyer rtsa mchog tu gshegs nas
NK125(co)001:671: shing sa la zung gi tshal du gzims mal gyi
NK125(co)001:674: me tog gi char bab pa dang /
NK125(co)001:675: lha dang mi yi mchod tshogs du ma dang bcas /
NK125(co)001:676: cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa snang bzhin /
NK125(co)001:677: bud shing zad pa'i me ltar sku mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul bstan pa dang /
NK125(co)001:678: kun dga' bo la sogs pas /
NK125(co)001:679: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la ji ltar bya ba'i tshul bzhin /
NK125(co)001:680: sku la ras bal 'jam pos dkris shing /
NK125(co)001:681: 'bru mar gyis bkang ba'i lcags kyi sgrom bur bzhugs te /
NK125(co)001:683: me bzhes par ma gyur par /
NK125(co)001:684: slar nyid kyi thugs ka nas ye shes kyi me
NK125(co)001:685: rang byung bas zhag bdun du 'bar bas sbyongs la
NK125(co)001:686: / ring bsrel ma ga rda'i khal bcu gnyis byon
NK125(co)001:687: pa cha brgyad du gyur nas ser skya la sogs
NK125(co)001:688: grong khyer rnams su babs te /
NK125(co)001:689: sku gdung gis kyang 'gro ba mang po'i don rgya
NK125(co)001:690: chen por mdzad pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan
NK125(co)001:691: las 'das par gshegs pa'i mdzad pa rnams so //
NK125(co)001:692: de ltar thub dbang mchog gi mdzad pa ni /
NK125(co)001:693: sa bcu'i 'phags pas kyang ni bsam mi khyab //
NK125(co)001:694: 'on kyang rnam pa bcu gnyis grangs su ni //
NK125(co)001:695: yongs su grags pa'i bka' dang gzhung las gsungs //
NK125(co)001:696: byis pa byis pa'i gos bzhin nyung ngu'i tshig /
NK125(co)001:697: snyigs ma'i skye bo gsar bu la 'tshams phyir //
NK125(co)001:698: 'di tsam legs 'dzin blo gros cher rgyas tshe //
NK125(co)001:699: des chog mi sems rgyas pa'i gzhung la gzigs //
NK125(co)001:700: gang zhig nyon mongs med pa'i yid kyis su //
NK125(co)001:701: bde bar gshegs la len cig dad pa'i sems //
NK125(co)001:702: skyes pas ngan 'gror rgyab kyis phyogs byas shing //
NK125(co)001:703: rga shi zad pa'i gnas thob mdo las gsungs //
NK125(co)001:704: de phyir dman pa bdag 'dras 'di brjod pa //
NK125(co)001:705: brjod bya bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan phyir //
NK125(co)001:706: 'di bris 'bras bu med par mi srid pas //
NK125(co)001:707: dge ba gang de byang chen rgyur gyur cig /
NK125(co)001:708: ces pa 'adi'ang rgyas 'gyur gyi rigs zab pa'i mtshan
NK125(co)001:709: ma can gzhon nu blo gros rgyal mtshan zhes bgyi
NK125(co)001:710: ba / re zhig gsar bu sku na cher ma
NK125(co)001:711: langs pa sbyong brtson gyi thog mar babs pa'i rgyus
NK125(co)001:712: ba / / dam pa gzhan gyis bkod pa rgya
NK125(co)001:713: che ba'i tshigs tshogs la 'jigs pa gang gi thugs
NK125(co)001:715: dman pa nags su bsti ba gu na b+ha dra
NK125(co)001:716: d+ha ras bas matha'i tshal gang nas bris te phul
NK125(co)001:717: ba mang thos kyi yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu'i
NK125(co)001:718: dbang phyug dam par gyur cig //
NK125(co)001:719: sarba d+aa ka l+y+aa b+ha ba tu /
